title: Best Rice and Beans
ingredients: ['225g dry kidney beans', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '190g uncooked long grain white rice', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon adobo seasoning (optional)', '1 tablespoon sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '3 sprigs fresh parsley', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli']
